metadata.title: User Variables - Templates
metadata.description:
User variables allow your templates to be further configured with variables
from the command-line, environment variables, or files. This lets you
parameterize your templates so that you can keep secret tokens,
environment-specific data, and other types of information out of your
templates. This maximizes the portability and shareability of the template.

outlineItems.title: Making a provisioner step conditional on the value of a variable

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Packer Integrations.
